2fc89f85-3920-4dcf-81aa-d98f1429104f.description: This badge indicates a learner's completion of the Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Business Fundamentals. Learners who have earned this badge have gained an understanding of core business skills needed to thrive in the workplace. They have learned the fundamentals of finance, marketing, and business case development, how to understand customers and their needs, how to use measurement to manage individual and team performance, and how to prepare and conduct an effective negotiation.
2fc89f85-3920-4dcf-81aa-d98f1429104f.name: Business Fundamentals

issuer.summary: issued by Harvard Business Publishing Education

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has completed all lessons, exercises, and assessments within the six Harvard ManageMentor topics contained in the Business Fundamentals Collection: Finance Essentials, Business Case Development, Marketing Essentials, Customer Focus, Negotiation, and Performance Measurement.
The Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Business Fundamentals is available to higher education students assigned this collection through Harvard Business Publishing Education's website.

4bc51b30-db9f-4e09-9bd7-7c006686571f.description: This badge indicates a learner's completion of the Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Leadership. Learners who have earned this badge have honed their leadership skillset to succeed in a management role. They have learned how to effectively lead by inspiring trust and motivation, when and how to delegate, how to lead and implement change, how to identify and act on coaching opportunities, how to build and enable a team to succeed, and learned to apply strategic thinking to generate results.
4bc51b30-db9f-4e09-9bd7-7c006686571f.name: Leadership

issuer.summary: issued by Harvard Business Publishing Education

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has completed all lessons, exercises, and assessments within the six Harvard ManageMentor topics contained in the Leadership Collection: Leading People, Delegating, Change Management, Coaching, Team Management, Strategic Thinking.
The Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Leadership is available to higher education students assigned this collection through Harvard Business Publishing Education's website.

ac6dfd9d-0cba-4797-aceb-4737a813cd12.description: This badge indicates a learner's completion of the Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Early Career Readiness. Learners who have earned this badge have gained essential soft skills to succeed in the workplace. They have learned the importance of diversity and leading inclusively, learned innovation, creativity, and how to foster idea generation, how to build and leverage networks, goal setting and achievement, how to harness the power of feedback, and how to prepare engaging presentations.
ac6dfd9d-0cba-4797-aceb-4737a813cd12.name: Early Career Readiness

issuer.summary: issued by Harvard Business Publishing Education

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has completed all lessons, exercises, and assessments within the six Harvard ManageMentor topics contained in the Early Career Readiness Collection: Diversity, Inclusion, and Belonging; Innovation and Creativity; Leveraging Your Networks; Goal Setting; Feedback Essentials; and Presentation Skills.
The Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Early Career Readiness is available to higher education students assigned this collection through Harvard Business Publishing Education's website.

2c7813bb-7691-48bf-833d-051bc03cf464.description: This badge indicates a learner's completion of the Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Managing Yourself. Learners who have earned this badge have learned to discover their talents, explore career options, and manage themselves as they navigate life. They have uncovered their interests, skills, and values, learned how to manage their career, how to make decisions effectively, overcome difficult interactions, strengthen their credibility, and how to manage stress and time to achieve their goals.
2c7813bb-7691-48bf-833d-051bc03cf464.name: Managing Yourself

issuer.summary: issued by Harvard Business Publishing Education

badge_template_activities.title: The learner has completed all lessons, exercises, and assessments within the six Harvard ManageMentor topics contained in the Managing Yourself Collection: Career Management, Decision Making, Difficult Interactions, Persuading Others, Stress Management, and Time Management.
The Harvard ManageMentor Collection: Managing Yourself is available to higher education students assigned this collection through Harvard Business Publishing Education's website.
